rule.Sql: select ID, StorageName, OwnArea, SubOwnArea, matterType, LankMarkCode, StorageState, LockState, MaterielType from tbLocaton order by ID asc

rule.RuleName: 根据动作地标查询命令
rule.Sql: select r.*,c.CmdName from tbRouteFragmentConfig r left join tbCmd c on r.CmdCode=c.CmdCode where ActionLandMark='$ActionLandMark$'
select BeginLandMakCode, EndLandMarkCode, Length, ExcuteAngle from tbAllSegment

rule.RuleName: 查询特殊行走方向设置
删除特殊行走方向设置
保存特殊行走方向设置

rule.Sql: insert into tbSysParamater ( ParameterCode, ParameterValue ) values ( '$ParameterCode$', '$ParameterValue$' )

rule.RuleName: 加载系统参数模板信息
根据系统参数编码取系统参数信息
rule.Sql: select ParameterCode, ParameterValue from tbSysParamater where ParameterCode='$ParameterCode$'

rule.RuleName: 根据地标编码取地标信息
rule.Sql: select LandCode as LandmarkCode, LandName as LandMarkName, LandY as LandY, LandX as LandX from tbLandMark where $Condition$
select CarCode as AgvID, CarName as CarName, CarState as IsUse, CarIP, CarPort, StandbyLandMark from tbCar
insert into tbCar ( CarCode, CarName, CarState, CarIP, CarPort, StandbyLandMark ) values ( $CarCode$, '$CarName$', $CarState$, '$CarIP$', '$CarPort$', '$StandbyLandMark$' )
select CmdCode, CmdName, CmdOrder from tbCmd

rule.RuleName: 删除所有的区域车辆信息
加载所有的区域车辆信息

rule.Sql: insert into tbLandmarkResList ( ID, Description, LandMarkList ) values ( $ID$, '$Description$', '$LandMarkList$' )

rule.RuleName: 保存所有的区域车辆信息
rule.Sql: insert into tbTraJunction ( TraJunctionID, Carnumber, JunctionLandMarkCodes ) values ( $TraJunctionID$, $Carnumber$, '$JunctionLandMarkCodes$' )
insert into tbLandMark ( LandCode, LandName, LandY, LandX ) values $Value_Sql$
delete from tbLocaton where ID not in ($DelStockConditon$)
insert into tbAGVCoordinate ( Direction, Angle ) values ( $Direction$, $Angle$ )

rule.RuleName: 查询所有用户分类权限按钮档案
删除用户分类按钮对照

rule.Sql: insert into tbUserCategoryToButton ( ButtonName, ButtonType, CategoryCode )values ( '$ButtonName$', $ButtonType$, '$CategoryCode$')

rule.RuleName: 根据用户分类编码查询系统按钮
rule.Sql: select b.ButtonType, b.ButtonName, b.ButtonCaption, t.CategoryCode from tbSysOperButton b inner join tbUserCategoryToButton t on b.ButtonName=t.ButtonName where t.CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'

rule.RuleName: 根据分类编码查询用户
rule.Sql: select a.* from tbUser a inner join tbUserToCategory b on a.UserID=b.UserID where b.CategoryCode='$CategoryCode$'

rule.RuleName: 查询最后一条用户分类编码
rule.Sql: select top 1 CategoryCode from tbUserCategory order by CategoryCode desc

rule.RuleName: 根据用户ID删除用户分类对照

rule.Sql: insert into tbUser ( UserID, PassWord, UserName ) values ( '$UserID$', '$PassWord$', '$UserName$' )
select top 1 UserID from tbUser order by UserID desc
select UserID, PassWord, UserName from tbUser where UserID='$UserID$' and PassWord='$PassWord$'
select QueryCode, QueryName, sqlStr from tbDetailQuery
select QueryCode, ConditionCode, ConditionName, ConditionValue, control_type, X, Y from tbDetailCondition where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
select QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType from tbDetailQueryFiled where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'

rule.RuleName: 根据编码查询报表信息表
rule.Sql: select QueryCode, QueryName, sqlStr from tbDetailQuery where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'
select QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType from tbDetailQueryFiled where QueryCode='$QueryCode$'

insert into tbDetailCondition ( QueryCode, ConditionCode, ConditionName, ConditionValue, control_type, X, Y ) values ( '$QueryCode$', '$ConditionCode$', '$ConditionName$', '$ConditionValue$', $control_type$, $X$, $Y$ );
insert into tbDetailQueryFiled ( QueryCode, FiledCode, FiledName, SummaryType ) values ( '$QueryCode$', '$FiledCode$', '$FiledName$', $SummaryType$ );
insert into tbAreaInfo ( OwnArea, AreaName ) values ( $OwnArea$, '$AreaName$' )
insert into tbMaterialInfo ( MaterialType, MaterialName ) values ( $MaterialType$, '$MaterialName$' )

delete from tbIOActionInfo where ActionID=$ActionID$; insert into tbIOActionInfo ( ActionID, ActionName, IsPass, IsWait, DeviceID, TerminalID, TerminalType, WaitTime, TerminalData ) values ( $ActionID$, '$ActionName$', $IsPass$, $IsWait$, $DeviceID$, $TerminalID$, $TerminalType$, $WaitTime$, $TerminalData$ );

rule.RuleName: 加载所有的呼叫盒信息

rule.Sql: delete from tbCallBoxInfo where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$; delete from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$;

delete from tbCallBoxDetail where CallBoxID=$CallBoxID$ and ButtonID=$ButtonID$; insert into tbCallBoxDetail ( CallBoxID, ButtonID, TaskConditonCode, OperaType, LocationID, LocationState ) values ( $CallBoxID$, $ButtonID$, '$TaskConditonCode$', $OperaType$, $LocationID$, $LocationState$ );

rule.RuleName: 加载所有的任务条件配置信息
加载任务条件配置明细

rule.Sql: select * from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$DetailID$

delete from tbTaskConfigDetail where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and DetailID=$DetailID$; insert into tbTaskConfigDetail ( TaskConditonCode, DetailID, ArmOwnArea, StorageState, MaterialType, Action, IsWaitPass ) values ( '$TaskConditonCode$', $DetailID$, $ArmOwnArea$, $StorageState$, $MaterialType$, $Action$, $IsWaitPass$ );

rule.RuleName: 任务条件配置必经地标
rule.Sql: delete from tbTaskConfigMustPass where TaskConditonCode='$TaskConditonCode$' and TaskConfigDetailID=$TaskConfigDetailID$ and DetailID=$DetailID$; insert into tbTaskConfigMustPass ( TaskConditonCode, TaskConfigDetailID, DetailID, MustPassLandCode, Action ) values ( '$TaskConditonCode$', $TaskConfigDetailID$, $DetailID$, '$MustPassLandCode$', $Action$ );
